item.title: Bank of America says buy this little-known nuclear energy stock
item.description: BWX Technologies benefits from its monopolistic position, says BofA.

item.title: Piper Sandler upgrades Campbell Soup to buy, highlights sauces brand Rao's
item.description: Campbell Soup has a promising long-term growth outlook thanks to Rao's, its popular sauces brand, according to Piper Sandler.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield inches higher as investors await economic data, Fed speeches
item.description: Treasury yields rose on Thursday as investors monitored a fresh batch of economic data and a flurry of speeches from Federal Reserve policymakers.

item.title: Tech giants are investing in 'sovereign AI' to help Europe cut its dependence on the U.S.
item.description: Tech giants are investing in the development of "sovereign" AI models in Europe to reduce the region's dependence on largely U.S.-controlled infrastru...

item.title: Special counsel Jack Smith seeks pause in Trump classified documents case appeal
item.description: The election of Donald Trump as president prompted prosecutors to ask for pauses in three criminal cases against the Republican.
